caption: Kerberos Ticket
description: The Kerberos Ticket object contains the attributes pertaining to a Kerberos ticket.
name: kerberos_ticket

created_time.description: The time that the Kerberos ticket was created.

encryption_details.description: The encryption details of the Kerberos ticket.

expiration_time.description: The time that the Kerberos ticket is set to expire.

ticket_flags.description: The specific attributes or permissions, such as whether a ticket is renewable or forwardable

type.description: The type of the Kerberos ticket.

type_id.caption: Type ID
type_id.description: The normalized Kerberos ticket type identifier.

0.caption: Unknown
0.description: The Kerberos ticket type is unknown.
